description: Sensors that detect adolescent-mode decision patterns and promote long-horizon, relational maturity. Pair with Truncation, Vault Paradox, Capture Cascade, and Feedback Blindness.

sensors.title: Adolescent Maximization (Single-Objective)
sensors.pattern: Optimize a single metric ('X at all costs') without multi-objective or ecological constraints.
signals: Throughput rewarded when utility/regeneration are flat or negative
mitigation_recommendations: Adopt multi-objective utility (value, health, resilience, equity, optionality)
Tie incentives to matched production-to-need + regeneration

sensors.title: Foresight Horizon (Seven-Generations Check)
sensors.pattern: Decisions optimize near-term cycles while degrading long-term viability.
mitigation_recommendations: Require decommission + restoration budgets up front
Reward options that increase future optionality

sensors.title: Ego/Status Amplification
sensors.pattern: Prestige, hierarchy, or spectacle drive choices over relational balance.
signals: Visibility prioritized over redundancy and quiet resilience
Authority concentrated in figures rather than stewardship councils
mitigation_recommendations: Audit motives (prestige vs. balance) before funding or scaling

sensors.title: Knowledge Continuity (Against Silo/Hoard)
sensors.pattern: Critical know-how is centralized, privatized, or hoarded (seedbanks, data, methods) without living rotation.
signals: Access controlled by power, not stewardship
impact: Loss of tacit skill and ecological fit
mitigation_recommendations: Rotate knowledge through practice (field cycles, apprenticeships)
Mirror to many small custodians; test access paths

sensors.title: Relational Balance vs. Zero-Sum
sensors.pattern: Policies/algorithms assume win/lose extraction instead of mutual sufficiency and regeneration.
signals: Language of conquest, market share at any cost
mitigation_recommendations: Encode reciprocity metrics (commons health, equity, regeneration)
Adopt cooperative game strategies by default
Require ecological/community health indices alongside profit/output
